title: Can we make pentakills more epic?
body:
Its a muthafkn Pentakill! The rift should draw energy from the champions power and shoot a laser beam from their teams turrets into the sky! I want the ground to shake to my supremacy, i want the enemies bodies to rot of gas, i want jungle camps to bow down to me as i walk by, i want the leaves to rustle of my essense.

For real though, pentakills are so boring.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=ExRa RivenXry,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=txYt4Wpd,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-05-25T13:49:20.977+0000)
>
i want jungle camps to bow down to me as i walk by

http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20141222072157/leagueoflegends/images/2/2c/Gromp.png : I've been a really bad boy today, please smite me, senpai!
You fool, it's the other way around. You should be the one asking to smite him.
Gromp is a demigod from another plane come to take his place atop of the League of Legends food chart, you should be begging him to smite you
http://www.troll.me/images/victory-baby/yes-thats-much-better-thumb.jpg
I thought you meant frog was about to smite me.
[You're actually correct.](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yHeWOQvVRd8&feature=youtu.be&t=1m40s)
wtf lol
He is a riven main He must think its normal to get penta kills every game :l
I'd find getting an assist with an adc more satisfiying than getting a penta with riven.
I've gotten 2 pentas in this past week

stop pls
I'm still QQ'ing over my 5 stolen pentas since I started playing LoL.
#NoPenta4Me
{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
Only 5? My friends take pentas on purpose for shits and giggles lol
Fireworks with the urf miniguns in the back ground with explosions and your name all over the map
Upvoted, then downvoted, so I could upvote again.

> [{quoted}](name=ILoveTyranny,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=txYt4Wpd,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-05-25T15:26:19.403+0000)
>
> Pentakills are cool with the huge, pretty icons with your face in the middle of them, but some people have suggested music playing in the background for your faction/city/champion.
> 
> So far the pentakills I have are with (From first to last)
> 
> {{champion:21}} 
> {{champion:51}} 
> {{champion:69}} 
> {{champion:268}} 
> 
> I would love to hear a Bilgewater theme for if I get a pentakill with Miss Fortune, Gangplank, Fizz, etc
> 
> Or a Shurima theme when I get a pentakill with Azir, Renekton, Xerath, Nasus, Cassiopeia, etc.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3x-ffzRPhWI

Shurima Theme
my one pentakill {{champion:41}} It would be cool to have the sound from each place though
in the same game our sion got a quadra afterwards
holy shit that is one pentakill I can respect

Is a Sion Penta also respectable?
Or a Viktor Quadra?

Noxus or Zaun music if you get a Penta? Im in!
I don't play with in-game music, so I'd never experience this. It's a neat idea, though, and I wouldn't, like, complain if they did it.
They should add in the stuff they had during Urf. Like you have something explode on screen.
They should take a note from Happy Wars. After the game where someone got a penta, they tie the enemy team to posts and let the guy who got the penta beat them with a stick for a minute.
Go away Kat main.
can we make penta-assists more epic? :3

Can we just have penta-assists in general?

-every support main ever
Large number of Katarina picks.
ya its really only exciting for the guy whos getting it
So is sex, but people trip over themselves for that.

The last kill to become a pentakill should be a finisher.

You know, like the one in URF.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oeOh047EN8g
{{champion:55}} sure lets do that. hahaha
You don't need it any more epic than when you're cuming buckets.
they might eventually make something like that... for 950 RP of course.
report vyaen nideed
I've always felt that the announcer sounds more excited for quadra kills than penta kills. It would be nice if the penta kill had a bit more flair.

Why not, and just why not, you should not make Pentakills more epic by yourself?

It' s not a game achievement, is your own.
inb4 last person on enemy team kills you and stops your pentakill and you get the  Killer Instinct "C-C-C-COMBO BREAKER!" sound in the background.

[Play](http://hydra-media.cursecdn.com/dota2.gamepedia.com/1/10/Announcer_kill_double_01.mp3) Double kill!
[Play](http://hydra-media.cursecdn.com/dota2.gamepedia.com/7/73/Announcer_kill_triple_01.mp3) Triple kill!
[Play](http://hydra-media.cursecdn.com/dota2.gamepedia.com/b/b5/Announcer_kill_ultra_01.mp3) Ultra kill!
[Play](http://hydra-media.cursecdn.com/dota2.gamepedia.com/8/86/Announcer_kill_rampage_01.mp3) Rampage!


Here is legendary [Play](http://hydra-media.cursecdn.com/dota2.gamepedia.com/2/2e/Announcer_kill_holy_01.mp3) Holy shit!
Personal favorite [Play](http://hydra-media.cursecdn.com/dota2.gamepedia.com/a/a0/Announcer_kill_monster_01.mp3) Monster kill!
Like this? 
Also epic music is playing when you get rampage.
(rampage is pentakill)


I wich lol had things like that.
From dota 2

I've said it before, I'll say it again, allow announcer packs to be sold riot. 

YOU ARE MISSING SO MUCH MONEY.
Let me get kills, shutdowns, executions to rengars manly voice and play it to the rest of the players, I'll be happy.
I can agree to this. I want the world to go bat shit crazy like in the last episode of fighting Frieza in DBZ
Ironically, did you know Frieza was suppose to be the end of DBZ (and when the creator stopped being mostly involved and the show devolved into adding numbers on the end of every ability lol)
I guess getting a giant banner on the screen and an announcer saying PENTAKILL just isn't enough for some people.
yes...YES
Also applies to Hexakills.
FIREWORKS! :D
The only real reason I would love pentakills to be more epic, is that when Draven gets one and his login music plays. "Draven! Draven!"
The audio needs to be Pentakeeeeeeel! As in the pentakill band singing the hella outta the rift.
As much as i agree with the sentiment,  it would make people rage even more when someone else gets 1 or 2 kills when you could have had the penta.
